title: Tallupooh
author: Tallupooh
content: in this life never give up. even though trials come repeatedly to you. keep thinking well and face everything with the hope that everything will be fine in time. because I believe that after difficulties there will be ease.let's encourage each other and keep fighting in this life full of tests.

comments.author: Sayakaaja
comments.body: yes, the name is also life, there will always be a test. encouraging yourself is easy, what's difficult is fighting with negative thoughts that always appear in every situation.

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: yes it is always ease after doing hard work ..

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I certainly do believe that after hardship comes ease. With that hardship you have a new perspective, an understanding to look forward to.That understanding with gratitude, happiness, and you can see that light through that dark tunnel. This can only be done with having an open mind and the effort it takes to get through it. Without one having that hope ease cannot be attainable.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: I'm sure after the difficulties there will definitely be ease. it's just that we need to be patient, when facing difficulties.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: Yes, I am sure. so we must think optimistically in the various tests we experience. it could be that after we pass the test, there we will get the convenience we have always dreamed of.

comments.author: Kath Bliss
comments.body: Absolutely! Together, we can make it through anything. Let's keep pushing forward, stay positive and never give up!!!

comments.author: Marshall Chord
comments.body: Keep believing in yourself, be resilient and stay positive. Together we can overcome any obstacle!
